title: BattleCast Tahm kench ?
body: I was thinking about how all the new champs only have 2 skins, besides ekko who got one not to long ago, I was thinking about how tahm needs a new skin, so its a BattleCast skin, that i think would fit well with tahm, So he would look like any other battlecast skin, His mouth would clap shut when used. His passive would be a cogwheel, His Q would charge up with steam then shoot out his tongue, His W would eat them(like always) and clamp shut his mouth, whilst grinding up the thing he ate with cogs in his stomach, His E would use a magnetic force field, and his ult would pull up a future like grid (like form the creator viktor back) and then he would start to fade away and then teleport to the location using some sort of teleportation machine. I think that would be a good idea for a skin
